Uses of Class
com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy.InvocationContext

Packages that use InvocationContext
com.lonepulse.robozombie.executor Contains a set of core and auxiliary classes which directs the execution of requests and manages the presentation of response results. 
com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which allows an endpoint definition interface to be validated and its mirrored proxy to be injected. 
com.lonepulse.robozombie.request Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which create requests and process requests for a proxy invocation using the annotated meta-data found on the endpoint definition. 
com.lonepulse.robozombie.response Contains the set of core and auxiliary classes which process requests of successful request executions for a proxy invocation using the annotated meta-data found on the endpoint definition. 
com.lonepulse.robozombie.util Contains a set of utility classes which isolate common and trivial tasks. 
 

Uses of InvocationContext in com.lonepulse.robozombie.executor
 

Methods in com.lonepulse.robozombie.executor with parameters of type InvocationContext
 org.apache.http.HttpResponse RequestExecutor.execute(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request)
          Executes the given HttpRequestBase using the HttpClient which is configured for use with the associated endopint and returns the resulting HttpResponse.
 org.apache.http.HttpResponse RequestExecutors.execute(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpRequestBase request)
          Executes the given HttpRequestBase using the HttpClient which is configured for use with the associated endopint and returns the resulting HttpResponse.
 void BasicExecutionHandler.onError(InvocationContext context, Exception error)
          Throws a InvocationException with the InvocationContext.
 void AsyncExecutionHandler.onError(InvocationContext context, Exception error)
          If an AsyncHandler is defined, any exception which resulted in an error will be available via the onError callback.
 void BasicExecutionHandler.onFailure(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)
          Throws a InvocationException with the InvocationContext and HttpResponse.
 void AsyncExecutionHandler.onFailure(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)
          The given HttpResponse with a successful status code is processed using the response processor chain (Processors.RESPONSE and if an AsyncHandler is defined, the given HttpResponse with a failed status code is submitted to the onFailure callback.
 void BasicExecutionHandler.onSuccess(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)
          No special action is taken for successful responses.
 void AsyncExecutionHandler.onSuccess(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)
          The given HttpResponse with a successful status code is processed using the response processor chain (Processors.RESPONSE and if an AsyncHandler is defined, the result of the processor chain is submitted to the onSuccess callback.
static RequestExecutor RequestExecutors.resolve(InvocationContext context)
          Discovers a suitable RequestExecutor for an InvocationContext.

Methods in com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy that return InvocationContext
 InvocationContext InvocationException.getContext()
          Retrieves the InvocationContext which initiated the failed request.
 

Methods in com.lonepulse.robozombie.proxy with parameters of type InvocationContext
static InvocationException InvocationException.newInstance(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.HttpResponse response)
          Creates a new instance of InvocationException with the HttpResponse (with the failed status code) and the InvocationContext which resulted in this response.
static InvocationException InvocationException.newInstance(InvocationContext context, org.apache.http.HttpResponse response, Throwable rootCause)
          Creates a new instance of InvocationException with the HttpResponse (with the failed status code) and the InvocationContext which resulted in this response, while preserving the stacktrace.
static InvocationException InvocationException.newInstance(InvocationContext context, Throwable rootCause)
          Creates a new instance of InvocationException for a failed request execution with the InvocationContext which was used to construct the request.

Methods in com.lonepulse.robozombie.util with parameters of type InvocationContext
static boolean Is.async(InvocationContext context)
          Determines if a proxy invocation should be handled asynchronously.
static
<E> List<Class<? extends E>>
Components.filterSkipped(InvocationContext context, List<Class<? extends E>> components)
          Accepts a list of components which are presumably attached to a request and removes those which are skipped from execution by consulting an available @Skip annotation on the request.
static boolean Components.isDetached(InvocationContext context, Class<? extends Annotation> type)
          Determines whether the request definition has detached the given Annotation type.
static
<T extends Annotation>
List<Map.Entry<T,Object>>
Metadata.onParams(Class<T> type, InvocationContext context)
          Finds all parameters on the request definition which are annotated with the given type and returns the annotation instance together with the runtime argument.
